markdownRemark.html:
NDArray

Nth dimensional array

Tensorflow

Tensorflow is to be coded in a declarative fashion. Which is not good for RNNs (Recurrent Neural Network) as well as for GANNs (Generative Adversarial Neural Networks)

PyTorch

PyTorch is to be coded in a imperative fashion.
